title: Loading DataParallel modules on CPU should be a noop
body_html:
Attempting to run torch.nn.DataParallel(nn.Linear(50,50)) on an instance with no GPU results in IndexError: list index out of range

Use Case

class Model(nn.Module):
    def(self, stuff):
       self.embedder = nn.Embedding(...)
       self.encoder = DataParallel(nn.Linear(....))
       self.decoder = DataParallel(nn.Linear(....))

Attempting to run `torch.nn.DataParallel(nn.Linear(50,50))` on an instance with no GPU results in `IndexError: list index out of range`

### Use Case
```
class Model(nn.Module):
    def(self, stuff):
       self.embedder = nn.Embedding(...)
       self.encoder = DataParallel(nn.Linear(....))
       self.decoder = DataParallel(nn.Linear(....))
```
